DOC.brief_summary: This study is being carried out to see if dapagliflozin in addition to glimepiride (sulphonylurea) is effective and safe in treating patients with type 2 diabetes when compared to glimepiride alone.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Dapagliflozin in Combination With Glimepiride (a Sulphonylurea) in Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Treatment with a stable sulphonylurea monotherapy dose that is at least half the maximal recommended dose for a minimum of 8 weeks prior to study Inadequate glycaemic control, defined as A1C ≥ 7.0 % and ≤ 10% Type 1 Diabetes Hepatic (liver) impairment Renal (kidney) failure or dysfunction
